message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $95. Looking forward to your response!

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $95 is still a bit lower than what I'm hoping for.  I'm willing to come down to $105.  This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll find this product very valuable. Let's make a deal!
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product, which is the most I can afford. I hope we can come to an agreement.
